title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight -  Oslo  Gardermoen Airport (ENGM) - version 1.5
description:
In this video we will look at version 1.5 of Oslo Gardermoen Airport. Besides the optimizations and custom ILS for the runway the developers have started to work on the interior of the terminals. And it is again quality work if you look at the level of detail it almost feels like you walk on the airport yourself. It is still work in progress because not all shops have all the details but I do expect that is just a matter of waiting for some new released before that is being implemented.

If you also want to give this airport a try download your own copy from:
https://flightsim.to/file/25434/oslo-gardermoen-airport-engm

tags: ENGM received an update in MSFS 2020
Updated Gardermoen airport for MSFS 2020 available for free
